name: Goldsmiths | IPG | Assignment 1
description:
First assignment for Introduction to Programming for Games course (and my first game!). For the most restorative experience, I suggest you play in fullscreen and remember Q to toggle inventory items! :)

Controls ActionControlMoveWASD  or arrow keysRunShiftJumpSpacebarLookMouseInteractEToggle inventoryQToggle mute on/offM Playtest Feedback Form
